description:
Access your PC remotely!
With RemoteWin you can remotely control your Windows PC from the palm of your hand!
RemoteWin gives you a remote portal to your Windows PC over your WebOS based phone. Use it to check on programs running on your desktop, or keep an eye on your children, or many other reasons to need remote access to your pc.

Features:
  -Easy to use interface, works as you would expect. Touch the screen to click, pinch to zoom.
  -Control the mouse on your computer, including clicking, double clicking, and right click.
  -Ctrl, Alt, and F key support.
  -Supports multiple screen systems.
  -Save multiple servers for easy connection
  -Scroll up / down hot keys

RemoteWin requires a windows server application to be installed on the target machine. More information can be found at
http://www.deepthoughtsoftware.com/RemoteWin

Fixed the screen orientation bug, will work landscape now
